ingredients.item: ½ x 500g bag frozen Cooks’ Ingredients Soffritto Mix
½ x 25g pack fresh parsley, chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a saucepan and fry the soffritto mix for 4-5 minutes. Stir in the lentils, tomatoes and 100ml water, then simmer for 10 minutes. Season and add the parsley.
Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti in boiling water for 8-10 minutes or until tender. Drain and serve with the lentil Bolognese.
